page.title: 07ENTERTAINMENT IN BREAN (2)
page.content: Most weekends there are varied amounts of entertainment including cabaret,dancing,comedians and country and western bands appearing.Some are the best in the country.You can also have parties arranged for you with two menu's Â£A'andÂ£B'. The Seagull Inn has good facilities including a children's room,Garden with a slide and swing.It also serves hot foods and is open all through the year not only in the summer. Since many of the small caravan sites provide no entertainment,these facilities are very much in demand at weekends and during holidays.
